Package bio.singa.structure.parser.pdb.structures

Interface StructureParser.SingleChainStep

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StructureParser.SingleModelStep
    Enclosing class:
    StructureParser
    public static interface StructureParser.SingleChainStep
    Initiates the selection of chains, if a single structure has been chosen.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      StructureParser.SingleParserFacade allChains()
      Parses all chains.
      StructureParser.SingleParserFacade chainIdentifier​(java.lang.String chainIdentifier)
      If only a single chain should be parsed, choose it here.

      Returns the parsed structure, skipping user contact with parsing.
